title: Great quality all around
text: I was very skeptical about shopping on here because I thought the prices were too good to be true, but this site really has great quality for an affordable price! They always have sales and coupons. You can also gain points and use it towards another purchase, which I think is great and different from other sites, such as fashion nova for example. Overall, I‚Äôve had a really good experience with them I would make sure to always go by their recommended sizing, as I‚Äôve found it to be very accurate (unlike others I‚Äôve tried following in the past) and always check the reviews to make sure you order the right size. App does not seem to have many problems that I‚Äôve noticed and have not had to deal with customer service yet so I cannot speak on actual service but the quality is great, only thing that is unfortunate is how backed up they are from the pandemic and is causing shipping to be take very long which is understandable hopefully things will go back to normal soon for everyone!

title: Amazing company, but could do better
text: Timing for overseas shipping has been almost wonderful. I have ordered a few shipments from SHEIN, only to have something missing a few times. It‚Äôs okay, it was only a few dollars for the things I bought but it is still my money. When buying things, make sure to check the size chart. They have improved by adding returns (finally) because now you can return them. I still encourage you to read the titles correctly because I‚Äôve also made the mistake since some things are seen so similar on here. for my BIKINI girls, material is legit and comfy. All I ask is for you to please make sure the size fits because their bikinis come different even if you order the same style in different prints sometimes they come weird. I definitely recommend using this over paying tons of money for it somewhere else but just be careful. Also have heard rumors that they get your info, I‚Äôm already on here so who cares! Lol. Please just be aware of what you buy or put on the app. Overall is a great app and I will definitely order again.

title: Amazing options for everyone‚Ä¶even plus sized!
text: As a big girl, I am consistently amazed at the cute options that work for my plus sized body. Not only that, but they are very affordable. I used to shop at DressBarn and Lane Bryant locally but both shops closed and not being able to try things on before I buy really limited my choices. With SHEIN their return policy makes my decisions easier knowing that I can return them for a full refund. Word to the wise: the return is free for the first return but what that means is if you order 10 items, try them all on and if you aren‚Äôt satisfied return however many you want. Just make sure you do the return all at once to insure it‚Äôs a free return. If you return one and then the next week decide to return another from the same order separately then you have to pay a return shipping fee. I‚Äôve never had any return issues. That way you can figure out what your size is since it can be a little different. I am normally an XL and in SHEIN I tend to be 3X.

title: I love this app, but...
text: Listen, I am a HUGE shein fan. Been shopping with them for about 4 years and I love their stuff. I was super excited when their home collection launched as I was redoing my bedroom and wanted some decor from them. I placed 3 separate orders, all within a couple days of each other back in May. The first two got to me in about 2 weeks, maybe even a little shorter than that. However I have yet to receive the third order, and I placed it on MAY 13TH. I get it, covid, cutbacks, all that jazz, but good lord, it has been almost 40 days since I placed that order and I‚Äôm convinced it‚Äôs never coming at this point. I don‚Äôt know how I can go from placing the first two orders and getting both of them within 7-14 days, mind you, I placed my first order on MAY 9TH. This is ridiculous. My order did not move for 3 weeks. Nobody touched it, it wasn‚Äôt moved or handled for THREE WEEKS. It is JUST NOW in transit. I‚Äôm annoyed and I‚Äôm frustrated. I get that covid is causing delays, but come on. I have placed plenty of other orders with other companies wayyyyy after this one and received ALL OF THEM already. I completely understand the initial set back, but this is getting really old.

title: Bad customer service and a scan with the mini games
text: Under normal circumstances I enthuse rather highly about this app. I have always gotten what I had paid for quickly and felt my confidence growing with each purchase. Unfortunately, I started to play their mini game which promises you $100 if you get to a certain amount of diamonds. Not only did the game not reward me for the new users I had brought along, when I contacted customer service about it, I was guaranteed my last diamond needed to win. Once an invite finally went through, I only had received 0.2 diamond. Of course, I contacted customer service again about the problem with screenshots from the previous conversation. Instead of filling  my account with the money I would have won or figuring another way to resolve the problem - I was told to just play another round. I am in my last communication attempt with the customer service agent. If his response is the same then I will no longer be a customer of this store. I will be sad to leave but there are other stores that can treat their customers better and keep my closet stocked. Good luck on your next customer interaction.

title: Love Shein!!
text: I‚Äôm obsessed with this site. The app works well and makes it easy to track and use coupons which are frequently available. I have also been able to stack discounts on occasion. This site is not a rip off. I have ordered clothes, earrings, hats, and glue on nails and all have been exactly as pictured and described. I‚Äôve never had an issue when having to return, which has only been a couple times. The return process was easy and they refunded me within a week or so. Customer service has always been top notch. They are out of China so there are some syntax errors in communications and descriptions but still easy to understand. I don‚Äôt understand how they can sell their stuff for so cheap and ship for free from China! And the shipping time is usually only about 2 weeks. I have so many cute dresses and earrings. Every pair of earrings have been a dollar or maybe a buck fifty and they are cute and exactly as pictured! It‚Äôs incredible. There‚Äôs something for everyone. I‚Äôm a customer for life.

title: SHEIN is pretty solid
text: Like many other comments have mentioned, I was skeptical at first about ordering from this site/app. But, I‚Äôm glad I gave it a chance because this is now my go-to app for clothing shopping. There are sooooooo many options in all different categories for all different occasions‚Äîhonestly I probably scroll endlessly through this app for way too long! But I can‚Äôt help it, the clothes are cute, affordable, and the quality is better than what I was expecting. Of course there are times when I order something that I just don‚Äôt like‚Äîit doesn‚Äôt fit how I want it to or I don‚Äôt like the material, or whatever‚Äîbut returning has been pretty quick, easy, and painless. They‚Äôre usually on top of returns. For example, I recently purchased a multitude of items but one item ended up being out of stock after I had purchased it. They notified me and issued me a refund, which I received for that item BEFORE I even received my package ‚Äîwhich was less than a week after my initial order‚Äîwith all the other items I had bought.

title: I‚Äôm on the fence

title: I love SHEIN!
text: I absolutely love this shopping app! I‚Äôm not a skinny girl and it seems like every clothing thinks plus size women should dress in ugly patterns that can be compared to old, ugly wallpaper. SHEIN has very modern, colorful, and weird pieces that I absolutely love. My whole closet is basically from SHEIN honestly. Now, with most online clothing stores there is always going to be some hit or miss purchases, but once you get a feel for their sizing charts and the feel of different materials/styles used, it‚Äôs one of the best shopping experiences I‚Äôve had. Knowing your measurements and reading other shoppers reviews has helped me tremendously. I‚Äôm impatient, so the amount of time it takes your haul to arrive seems forever, but it‚Äôs like re-shopping once it does arrive. That being said, I‚Äôve never returned anything because the hassle isn‚Äôt worth it to me, but I‚Äôm usually happy with about 90% of my buys. I air dry everything and haven‚Äôt had a problem with quality as of yet, so if you‚Äôre curvy and stylish, I‚Äôd definitely recommend SHEIN. It was a fashion game changer for me!! Thank you SHEIN!!

title: SHEIN: what I was looking for

title: I love the clothes at SHEIN but
text: I personally love most everything I get from SHEIN and the prices are great for someone in high school saving for college. However my only problem is the size ranges. In most outfits I like they don‚Äôt have my size so it‚Äôs a major disappointment. Especially when I fall in love with something and go to put it in my cart and see it only offers small, medium, and large. I just wish their clothing was more size inclusive. I am in that weird spot where I am not plus size but I‚Äôm not normal sizes. I can wear a large shirt but I prefer x-large to be comfortable. But while they might have more options with x-large it caught my attention how much isn‚Äôt available to plus size. My hips are wide so when it comes to the pants section I need like a double x and in most of the items they don‚Äôt offer that. Meaning for most plus size or even slightly bigger than ‚Äúnormal‚Äù people they aren‚Äôt included in most of the store which is a very sad thing. I love most of the item I can find and that‚Äôs the 3 stars but I can‚Äôt give them 5 until they fix there issues and be completely size inclusive.

title: Don‚Äôt shop here please
text: I used to love shein. Used to look on the app 24/7 and add stuff to my wishlist. A month ago or so i got a huge $300 worth haul of clothing. (I am VERY picky. I think long and hard and read all reviews before adding something to my cart and always change my mind). When I first received the package, I was so excited. I tried on everything and it was so cute. But almost everything reacted badly to the wash. One of my favorite white tshirts pilled IMMEDIATELY. I had to do like 3 loads of laundry when I first washed them because the material is so dang cheap. Got these jeans I was soo excited for..the popular momo jeans on the site..material is awful and they‚Äôre so tight. The only thing I sort of like and recommend are the underwear. I‚Äôve had no issues with them. Although I won‚Äôt be buying from here anymore since it‚Äôs 1. Child labor use 2. Crappy material/quality which gets worse over time 3. Nothing like you‚Äôd expect it to be on the site ...and much more. Just don‚Äôt waste your time. Save your money and buy from places that are better for the environment and that will last. After winter is done I‚Äôm getting rid of all my shein clothes because I hate them. If you read this review through all the way, please take my advice and shop elsewhere. Thank you.

title: Pretty nice :)
text:
I first downloaded Shein because I saw an ad for it in Instagram, and one of the products caught my eye because it looked like something my boyfriend would like. So I downloaded the app, made my account and connected my card with no issues, and ordered it. I realized literally that same day that it wouldn‚Äôt arrive in time so I got it refunded into Shein cash, and the next day they gave me my money back. 
It‚Äôs super easy to use and the shopping time isn‚Äôt too long, maybe a couple weeks at most. There‚Äôs a large variety of stuff, from clothing to accessories to even kitchen stuff or stuff for college dorms! You can find just about anything there honestly, and for cheap. Plus, when you leave a review, you can earn Shein money from it when people leave a like on your review. There‚Äôs also days with free shipping or games where you have a chance to win discounts, coupons, or free Shein cash. Id highly recommend this app, especially for those with a tight budget :)

title: Favorite‚ù§Ô∏è
text:
This online clothing store is absolutely one of my favorites. Not everyone wants to pay for really pricey clothing - I would rather get a few different things for the same price of one item you'll be buying from expensive clothing lines. And the quality is usually just as good! Some items are made a little bit cheaper but that‚Äôs honestly rare, the KEY IS TO READ THE REVIEWS AND KNOW YOUR CORRECT  
SIZING. They make it very easy to match up  your sizing, just make sure your measurements are correct. Overall - their shipping is fast, returns are easy (showed proof of returned items and got a refund or store wallet credit immediately), quality products, SUCH a big selection, and especially you CAN‚ÄôT beat the prices. Just give it a try, I promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Just recieved my 1st order!
text:
WOW! I always make my 1st order with a new online company small to test for quality, I was not dissapointed!   Recieved in a timely manner and all quality products.  When you live in a small rural community you want to find a good online company where you know what you see online is actually what you get.  I have tried others, and it was always hit n miss- some things were nice n others were a total dissapointment.  Not here!
Happily, when I find what I‚Äôm looking for here and the price is reasonable I can order knowing I am getting exactly what I saw advertised .  I worked for UPS during holiday season and could see what companies were being used the most.  I turned a lot of (wish) shoppers onto this company, and I haven‚Äôt heard that anyone has been dissapointed!  Free shipping? Really?  If you buy from a competitor how much did u pay for shipping?  Just an extra expense increasing the cost for you-
Just check them out- happy shopping!!

title: Love
text:
SHEIN has been put down because it is a "fast fashion" company but if you buy the right clothing, it will actually last a long time and is super cute. First the pros - the sizing is pretty spot on and if you read the reviews with the pictures You get a very good idea of what you're buying. I personally only buy clothing that has reviews with pictures and it has been pretty good. Also, the return process is super easy. I love that it is free to return items, and if you put the money back in your SHEIN wallet you get it fairly quickly. I have only done one return where I got the money back into my bank account and it also didn't take that long. They have sales & coupons all the time which makes it more affordable. Also, if you write good reviews with pictures, you get points to use towards your next purchase.
Now the cons - Some of the clothing doesn't look like the picture or is not very well-made even if you look at the picture reviews you sometimes get clothing that is not sewn right or has imperfections. Also some people don't know quality clothing and will rate something as good when it's not.
Other than that, I love all of the different styles they offer at an affordable price I got a couple of items from them and get a lot of compliments. I highly recommend SHEIN just don't use it as fast fashion and if you're going to do it that way, please give the clothing to the thrift store or the SHIEN resale app.

title: I'll give you the real deal.
text: Shein is for the most part trustworthy.  If you or your parents are iffy on buying from there there are a few things you should know. title: Fast fashion and child labor
text:

title: ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨

title: Pants
text:

          I live for your clothes, they are so cute. I just have one suggestion for you guys, if a order come‚Äôs  in two different packages can you separate the orders so if one arrives before the other they can click confirm delivery but if they ordered the wrong size in the other package they can cancel it. title: Love everything you can love in a shopping experience!
text: This app is the most fun! If it had no shipping fees(but they are definitely doable), and got here instantaneously (but the anticipation is fun, not too long a wait) this would be perfect! It‚Äôs got a community of women and girls hanging out and shopping together, new designers with great eye and imagination, awesome prices, unique styles, everything you may want! The coupons, points, reviews, comments, it is truly a fun and honestly honorable shopping experience with ppl who have a strong work ethic that really put an effort into making it that way! The participation, playfulness,  prices, people, and products are pert near perfect for a day of shopping. My friends love it via Lea!  They order with me sometimes!  There are a lot more of us checking things out than just me, on my devices! lol We‚Äôre ALL looking forward to Oct and Cmas budgets!  I‚Äôm so looking forward to buying Cmas for everyone! A wonderful excuse to play with this app and shop!!  Love the fun of it!

title: you won‚Äôt regret it!
text: About a year ago I was super nervous to make my first purchase at ZAFUL, but after getting a review from a close friend I decided to go big, and after buying 20+ items, and being happy with EACH and every piece of clothing I got I can assure you that you won‚Äôt regret buying from ZAFUL either. Every piece I got, fitted just perfectly and was just like the pictures, the quality was great and to this day I‚Äôm still wearing those items I got a year ago and that says a lot about the quality! After my first purchase I went ahead and bought lots and lots (not kidding) of swim suits and I can also say they‚Äôre good quality, affordable and super beautiful! And today ZAFUL clothing makes up for more than half of my closet and I‚Äôm not mad about it! And also the costumer service did not disappoint me, they were quick to get back to me and solve any problems I had, and the shipping only takes at the most 2 weeks. All and all I rate ZAFUL 5 starts because they deserve all of them! Amazing job ZAFUL!

title: New wardrobe!
text: So I‚Äôm the type of woman who loathes shopping for clothes in-store. I usually spend too long walking around looking for the right size, style, and price for what I want. Some might say I‚Äôm picky about my clothes. I‚Äôd say I just want something that fits and suits my style. So my nieces told me about SHEIN. They had such cute stuff and I was curious where they got them. They talked SHEIN up. So I downloaded the app and gave it a shot. No regrets! My first round of outfits had some that fit a little loose and some that were just right. I have body image issues and tend to think I‚Äôm bigger than I actually am. Suffice it to say, I‚Äôm using most of the clothes I first bought and gave a shirt and dress to charity that didn‚Äôt fit me. This most recent round of outfits all fit great and I love their pants! Tee shirts coming in next cause I bought mostly blouses and ‚Äúnice‚Äù shirts. The thing I love is shopping from the comfort of my bedroom. Would definitely recommend SHEIN to anybody and have done so!

title: Amazing store only a few issues
text: This store is actually really good! Some people might say it‚Äôs not trustworthy or bad quality but I disagree. Every single time I‚Äôve ordered from Shein, my clothes have came on time, very well packaged, and I loved them. Honestly, there are only two problems I have. The first is with the 10-12 year old clothing. I‚Äôve been shopping at this store for about 4 years since I was 11 and this problem came up around that time. I ordered some clothes for myself but when they came, the material was weird and they didn‚Äôt look quite like the picture. HOWEVER: Before you start thinking that this store is untrustworthy, it‚Äôs really only the 10-12 year old clothing that is like that. ALWAYS look at reviews! My second problem is with the packaging. They use way to much plastic. Every single clothing item is packaged in its own bag of plastic. It‚Äôs not just Shien though, it‚Äôs many companies. But it would be really nice if the plastic amount could be reduced! title: Horrible
text: First time using SHEIN and I bought my daughter some clothes beginning of September. I received the items roughly a week later. Move forward to this week someone hacked into my account somehow and said I never received those items even though I confirmed delivery and gave reviews and even have a picture of my daughter in one of the outfits. So I opened a ticket to let them know I don‚Äôt want a refund I have the items. We keep going back and forth and they used my correct name of Amy in the email at first then they started calling me Jessica. I told them that‚Äôs not my name and my name is Amy. And someone was using the live chat as me and I have never done that and someone was using a different email account then what I have and then they want me to send a picture of my email account. And the other person pretending to be me wanted the money in their PayPal account I don‚Äôt have a PayPal account. I told them I don‚Äôt want the refund that I‚Äôm happy with the stuff I ordered. And as of right now they aren‚Äôt even doing anything about it. So if it wasn‚Äôt me using the SHEIN why would I even try to tell them I don‚Äôt want the money. Im trying to help them out but im done it‚Äôs on them now

title: If you‚Äôre a college student, this will be your saving grace.
text: I‚Äôm a 20 year old student in college and I definitely don‚Äôt have the money to buy a $50 graphic T-shirt at popular shopping spots. When I first saw the Shein prices I was sure that they would be horrible quality, but they 100% aren‚Äôt. I order cute tops and T-shirt‚Äôs from shein for as low as $2 (I literally paid this for a cute crop top the other day), and the next week I‚Äôll see the same exact crop top I got at Urban Outfitters for $35. I haven‚Äôt had any bad experiences with Shein at all and all my clothes are worn a lot and have remained in good shape. There are so many flash sales and discounts available too, I could get 10 cute tops for $50 instead of getting one at a different store. I haven‚Äôt bought anything other than the clothes though, so I can‚Äôt tell you about the shoes or bags or anything, but the clothes are great. If you are tired of wasting money, download this app. People will ask you where you got your $5 stuff. 10/10 highly recommend

title: Brand Needs More Diversity ‚úåüèª‚úåüèº‚úåüèΩ‚úåüèæ‚úåüèø
text:
I am a huge fan of SHEIN and I refer you guys everywhere I go because I get great feedback on my SHEIN attire. The most affordable brand so far! I‚Äôve shopped your products a few time now and just realized, there isn‚Äôt much diversity going on with your brand on the website nor your social media sites. You definitely see a small amount of models of brown of decent modeling SHEIN products. Why is that? Oddly I see more diversity in the reviews and comment section on SHEIN website. 

I know my review may not be consider but I not only shop SHEIN brand for myself, I also shop for my two children as well. As a fond customer of the SHEIN brand, I would love to see more diversity amongst your models and more culture-geared promotions as well. I would love to see more models men, women and children of a variety of sizes, since you sell products varying in size.

Give us raffles to win products, give us interactive promotions, to encourage people to share more reviews and photos to help people find their appropriate sizes.

title: Legit
text: Actually been loving it! I have already made and received my first order and will be placing a second order soon! I am happy with everything I got, it was all exactly as pictured and the descriptions were accurate. To be completely transparent I did not order any clothes, so I cannot speak on clothing quality or sizing. I‚Äôve only ordered nail art supplies (everything from gemstones and stickers, to brushes, e-file bits and cuticle nippers) If that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre planning on shopping for too my best advice is: Pay attention to the descriptions on every product listing, even when it‚Äôs the same type of product in the same packaging as another listing. As long as you do that you shouldn‚Äôt be disappointed with your purchase. I say this bcuz, for example, with the gemstones some are glass and some are ABS plastic but they look exactly the same in the picture. The same brand and everything, but description will say weather they‚Äôre glass or ABS plastic.

title: I trust this company now more than ever!
text: At first I was Leary because I had a return that I thought I‚Äôd never see reimbursement for but I‚Äôm so thankful Shein cares to do the right thing. The only thing I‚Äôm a little unhappy about is the communication. I was asking then when the refund would happen but they didn‚Äôt tell be-they just said I was refunded but I didn‚Äôt see any money reimbursed. I forgot I used my discover card for the recent purchase and I finally got the refund but it was days after Shein told me I was refunded. It just takes time when you‚Äôre dealing with overseas-I‚Äôve been happy with 99.9% of my items-just read the descriptions very carefully-I ordered a wind chime but it looked like a shrink dink you‚Äôd hang from a rear view mirror. It didn‚Äôt chime either but it was cute-it had dangling gems-just not what I expected so I returned. That was only the thing I didn‚Äôt like in all the years I‚Äôve ordered from Shein! I‚Äôve been a customer since about 2010.

title: Great but there is always room for improvemmet..
text: Hello there, i think shein has a great selection of items with a great price. But i would work on the teenager‚Äôs items. I have been trying to order for my daughter, i can‚Äôt find anything her size, they are too small and there aren‚Äôt many options. As well as the items for kids. I ordered shoes for my son a couple of times and i always sized up and they were still too small. So the sizing is not accurate.  Not enough options for kids... With the ladies clothing, i ordered jeans a couple of times and the sewing is just wrong in all of them. It is tilted to one side from the top part and the crotch area is not done right too. It is not a mistake if the tailoring is wrong in most of the jeans.. so it would be great to fix that.. also it would be great to be able to pick pants based on the season and not have to go through all the pants to find what we are looking for.. also the quality and stitching in a lot of the items isn‚Äôt great... also I recommend u add a home button to every screen on Shein app.

title: pretty great app but a couple suggestions
text:
Ok so even tho I haven‚Äôt actually bought anything yet, I‚Äôm considering it and it seems pretty legit. I am having an issue: the pix of the items in my wishlist aren‚Äôt showing up? I have restarted my phone and have a good signal, I also deleted&reinstalled the app, nothing. Help?? Also: I would recommend
a setting so you can choose what type of items you see, like content restrictions, ya know? like a toggle switch. This is because I pretty much have to shop in women's sizes and I hate accidentally seeing inappropriate clothes and such. One more suggestion: a way to scroll thru items in your bag/wishlist. Like with this setting enabled, u click on an item, and scroll to the left/right to see the other items in your bag or wishlist. (maybe rather than tapping on the pic and scrolling bc that's how u see the other pix of that item, u tap&scroll on the white section) anyway other than that its a pretty good app!!

title: SHEIN STOP USING DHL AND ONTRAC!!!
text: I loved Shein when they used USPS, my packages were always delivered on time and never delivered to the wrong house or lost in transit. Now shein uses companies like DHL and Ontrac which are very untrustworthy companies (read the reviews online and take from my experience). I ordered around $250 dollars worth of items from Shein, DHL said they delivered the package to my home. Then when I called them they said they lost my package and they couldn‚Äôt do anything about it, awful costumer service and I couldn‚Äôt reach Shein so I lost out on $250 dollars worth of items! Anyways fast forward a couple months and I order again off Shein, this time ontrac is my delivery service. I got confirmation that my package was delivered yet I didn‚Äôt see anything outside, plus it‚Äôs a holiday and it states on their website they don‚Äôt deliver on this specific holiday. I started reading reviews about the company and scared myself! Luckily my neighbor had my package and brought it over. Ontrac does have a track record of delivering packages to the wrong house though so if you don‚Äôt have trust worthy neighbors I would be wary. Shein has unfortunately lost my business due to using sketchy delivery companies!

title: I LOVE this site !
text: This site is a diamond in the rough. I am always raving about it to my family and friends. I often find designer dupes on here! The prices are always affordable. As long as you read the reviews before you buy , you won‚Äôt be disappointed . The reviews are there to tell you if you need to size up or down or if you can just get your normal size. I love the fact that shein ALWAYS offers coupons! I don‚Äôt see any other site doing this. There are also multiple ways to earn free points that you can use on purchases. I often get at least $10- $20 off my whole purchase just from these two things! I have thought about getting a tripod and partnering with them. Reviewing their items and trying them on in videos if they sent them to me! I think one thing they should change is; the models should only wear things that you can purchase on shein. There have been times I seen things I liked that the model had on but I had to look for them elsewhere.

title: Great place for crafter too!
text:
I do a lot of crafting and it can be an expensive hobby. But with Shein, I can get a lot of my crafting supplies very inexpensively.
For people who make scrapbooking or journaling books, there is a plethora of supplies. From beautiful papers to amazing stickers.  For jewelry making,  everything you need start to finish. And you can‚Äôt beat the prices anywhere at any of the hobby stores in the states.  I get the exact same beads that I get at my big box hobby store for almost 80% less! That isn‚Äôt just a minor difference that‚Äôs a huge difference. Same quality because it‚Äôs the same exact packaging as what you get at the biggest online store there is.  I‚Äôm no lying, most of my crafting supplies comes right from Shein‚Äôs.
I love their clothes also because they have such a variety of selection.  Their clothes are so cute.  I‚Äôve even been ordering stuff for my husband and he‚Äôs been really happy with the clothing I bought for him.

title: Order delayed
text: I have reached out to SHIEN about five times now on both apps. I reached out on Instagram and I reached out on the app. I ordered my clothing and my shoes on September 21. The order was in transit on October 6. They said the arrival date is going to be October 8. It is now November 1, And I still have not received my order. They have no customer service, I contacted them five times and they said that they will get back to you in 24 hours. It has been way more than 24 hours and I still have not got any money back, any tracking thing, nothing. So I am going to wait until next week and if I don‚Äôt have my package then, I‚Äôm going to take it to court.I understand that if the order was supposed to come October 6 through October 8, it would take 5 to 10 days. It was 5 to 10 days then 11 to 17 days. It has now been 25 days, well almost 25 days, that I still have not received my package. If I don‚Äôt have my package next week, I‚Äôm going to take this to court or you guys will give me my money back. I‚Äôve tried not to take it on here because you guys have really cute clothing but you guys have to get some better costumer service. Not only the fact that you guys have no customer service number, is already bad enough.

title: Us Shein now it‚Äôs 100% worth it
text: I love Shein so much it is usually my go to when getting clothes. title: AMAZING
text: SHEIN is overall an amazing app. Sometimes the packages come late of there not the perfect size, but NOTHING CAN BEAT THOSE PRICES. DOWNLOAD RIGHT SHEIN RIGHT NOW IT WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE I PROMISE.

title: Slowly going downhill..
text: I used to absolutely love this app, but I swear it‚Äôs going downhill.. the styles are getting more and more bizarre, it stopped showing the little number at the bottom so you knew what item you were on vs how many items there were to scroll through, hundreds of items have just randomly been deleted from the site, including ones that I had in my cart! üò≠ Which I noticed when looking through my wishlist, they say sold out but when you click on them they come up with a special message. I had been waiting for at least a year on two items, between not having the money and it not being in stock, then I finally got them in an unpaid order and I‚Äôm TWO DAYS away from having the money and they were deleted from the site.. and there‚Äôs absolutely nothing similar to them.. I saw that today and I want to scream and just cry honestly.. the one I guess I could make myself if I get a cricket or whatever it‚Äôs called, but I have no clue how to make a skirt..

title: It just keeps getting better
text: So I‚Äôve been shopping on this app since 2019. And all I can say is it just keeps getting better. First off there are so many items to choose from. Which makes it easy to find something that matches your style. Or something perfect for certain events. And they always offer opportunities for you to receive a discount or a deal with any items you‚Äôre looking to purchase. And if you get an item that you can‚Äôt fit or just don‚Äôt like the return process is free and they will work with you to make you a happy customer. Their shipping time is quicker than you‚Äôd expect. On average my order always come within 7 or 9 days, which is always surprising to me. And recently with the newest update to the app, you can now see the different sellers/stores within SHEIN that you‚Äôre items are coming from in your cart before you check out. Which is something I really appreciate!

title: My review of SHEIN
text:
This is a great app if your looking for things and you want to get them cheap! Don‚Äôt get me wrong, SHEIN is great! I‚Äôve just had some issues with it. I‚Äôve ordered a couple things off of shein. The first package I ordered came like 3 days before it was supposed to, and I was really happy because I had found a reliable app! The second time I ordered some things, they came as they were supposed to, but were made of really bad material and easily broke. Not only, but one of the things I bought had been messed up. It was a present for my parent, a necklace, and it was damaged. The third time I ordered something was about late October of this year. The information on the app said that it would be here mid November, and I was okay with it, although I‚Äôd have to give someone a late birthday present. It‚Äôs nearly December and I‚Äôve written 3 issues to SHEIN, or at least tried to contact them about it. I don‚Äôt have my package, and I‚Äôm really upset because I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll ever get this package or not. 

    This is a good app for cheap things, but the delivery times are way off, either that or (no offense to SHEIN) a scam.

title: From a person who doesn‚Äôt online shop.
text: I love this website for buying clothes but the fact they have jewelry shoes accessories home decor and wigs that have great density color and life span i cannot help myself but to write a review. I normally only bulk shop at the malls but it‚Äôs so expensive and for my 21st birthday i decided to use Shein. Of course I was scared to get scammed or having things not coming in on time plus anxiety of not knowing if it will fit me considering my birthday was so close. I ordered 10+ items clothes jewelry shoes and even a metal crown that was absolutely gorgeous people thought it was custom made and i only paid 5 bucks! Not to mention it came a week earlier than the expected delivery date. This site will forever be my go to not only for the cheap prices but the EXPENSIVE look and comfortability in the clothes and other items especially shoes makes me feel safe to come back over and over. Never take this gem from us!

title: Fave Place to Shop
text: Originally I was hesitant to order from Shein because like most people I thought it would take months to receive my order (if it ever arrived) and the sizes would be too small. Boy was I wrong. After a close friend told me that she loved them, she recommended I give them a try. Her best advice to me was to look at the reviews and order the size based on what others said ‚Äúruns small‚Äù, ‚Äúruns big‚Äù, ‚Äúno stretch‚Äù, etc. A year later and I‚Äôve probably ordered close to 50 things. Some weren‚Äôt for me and I returned those easy enough but most stuff I‚Äôve been shocked at how good the quality is! Last 4 weddings I‚Äôve attended I‚Äôve worn dresses from Shein and I always get compliments every time. And it‚Äôs not just clothing, don‚Äôt skimp out on the home and kitchen section! I bought a bag resealed for $2 and I‚Äôm obsessed with it. If you‚Äôre thinking of ordering from Shein, do it! You will not regret it and I bet you‚Äôll become a fan just as fast as I did.
